body.name: YEAKE Vanity Makeup Mirror with Natural Bamboo Stand,8 Inch 1X/3X Magnification Double Sided 360 Degree Swivel Magnifying Mirror,Portable Table Desk Countertop Mirror Bathroom Shaving Make Up Mirror
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 43 mins
features: 3X MAGNIFICATION - Measures 1.7 x 7 x 8.2 high; Mirror Glass is 7.2 height, large mirror surface. This make up mirror is double sided with 1X/3X magnification. It can zoom in your facial detail and bring you a clear vision of your makeup look.
360° ROTATION - With 360°free rotation design, this 3X magnifying makeup mirror is easy for you to swivel and adjust the angle. You can easily select the best angle and position to make up.

QUALITY & CONSTRUCTION - This mirror is fully assembled. You can use a screwdriver to adjust the tightness of the screws. 100% natural bamboo bracket with matte plastic frame, waterproof, environmentally friendly and superb paint process, the bamboo base and white trim with simple style, adding stylish and modern decoration to any room.

PORTABLE & VERSATILE - This beauty mirror can be placed on every desktop or table, takes up small space on bathroom countertops, vanities, dressing tables, makeup tables or bedroom dressers. simple and lightweight design, can be used as a handheld mirror for morning makeup or a shaving mirror, etc.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - If you would have any questions, please feel free to contact us. we will Try our best to make the things right for you!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vanity Mirror with Bamboo Stand - 360°Swivel This multifunctional mirror offers a double-sided design that flips between 1x and 3x magnification, allowing you to view and make up with up-close accuracy. Perfect for placing on a vanity in your bedroom or bathroom, taking up small space.

Natural, Modern Minimalist Style YEAKE bamboo bathroom mirror bring a natural, modern look to any bathroom space while being durable and mirror clearly. The inherent beauty of this natural material adds a clean contemporary touch to your home decor. Dimensions: 7 x 1.7 x 8.2 in Weight: 1 lb Materials: white matte plastic frame and bamboo Stand Features: Double-sided 1x and 3x magnification, 360°swivel

Durable Bamboo Stand Modern and sleek design. The heavy-duty structure makes it stand stably on different platforms，safe and secure. Smooth circular arc edge, matte plastic frame protection, lightweight and sturdy. Adjustable This mirror is fully assembled but comes without a screwdriver. You can adjust the tightness of the screws by yourself if you find asymmetry on both sides of the mirror. Home Decoration The mirror stands 8.2 inches tall with an elegant white glossy finish to match any home decor – perfect for use on tables, vanities and countertops.

YEAKE Table Vanity Makeup Mirror,8-Inch Portable Folding Mirror with Metal Stand YEAKE ABS Plastic Double Sided 3X Magnification 360°Swivel Desk Mirror YEAKE 8-inch Flexible Gooseneck Bamboo Makeup Mirror YEAKE Flexible Gooseneck Makeup Mirror YEAKE Wood Hand Mirror Size of Mirror 5.91 x 0.71 x 7.87 in 6.7x 5.0 x 13 in 4.3 x 6.3 x 11 in 5.3 x 4.4 x 8.6 in 9.8 x 5.5 in Magnification 1X(Single Side) 1X,3X(Dual Sided) 1X(Single Side) 1X(Single Side) 1X(Single Side) Lighted No No No No No Detachable Base No ✓ ✓ ✓ No Material Type ABS Environmental Protection Plastic Frame& Metal bracket ABS Environmental Protection Plastic Frame & Base ABS Environmental Protection Plastic Frame & Natural Solid Wood Base ABS Environmental Protection Plastic Frame & Base Wood Handle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love my Mirror
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the YEAKE Vanity Makeup Mirror with a Natural Bamboo Stand, and I am absolutely thrilled with its performance and design. This mirror has become an essential part of my daily beauty routine, and its thoughtful features have exceeded my expectations.Design and Build Quality:The design of this makeup mirror is simply stunning. The combination of the sleek, modern mirror design with the natural bamboo stand gives it a touch of elegance and eco-friendliness. The bamboo stand feels sturdy and well-crafted, adding a sense of durability to the overall product.Mirror Functionality:The mirror offers both 1X and 3X magnification, making it versatile for various makeup needs. The 1X side is perfect for an overall view, while the 3X magnification allows for detailed work like applying eyeliner, plucking eyebrows, or perfecting intricate makeup looks. The clarity and distortion-free reflection of both sides are impressive, helping me achieve precise makeup application.360° Swivel:The 360-degree swivel feature is highly practical and allows me to adjust the mirror angle with ease. I can effortlessly switch between the two magnification levels or position the mirror to get the best lighting and angle for makeup application.Portability:The compact and portable design of this tabletop mirror is one of its most significant advantages. I often travel for work, and this mirror has become an essential travel companion. It fits neatly in my luggage, and the bamboo stand folds flat, making it easy to pack and carry along wherever I go.Versatility:While I primarily use this mirror for my makeup routine, its functionality extends beyond beauty tasks. I've found it useful for other activities, such as applying skincare products, shaving, or even using it as a desk mirror for quick touch-ups while working.Stability:The bamboo stand provides excellent stability, ensuring the mirror stays firmly in place on my tabletop or bathroom countertop. I never worry about it tipping over or slipping during use.Eco-Friendly Materials:As someone who values sustainability, I appreciate that this mirror incorporates natural bamboo in its design. It's refreshing to see a product that embraces eco-friendly materials without compromising on quality and aesthetics.Value for Money:Considering the mirror's exceptional build quality, functionality, and eco-friendly aspect, I believe it offers great value for the price. The durability and versatility of this mirror make it a worthwhile investment.In conclusion, the YEAKE Vanity Makeup Mirror with Natural Bamboo Stand has become an integral part of my daily routine. Its combination of functionality, eco-friendliness, and elegant design make it stand out among other makeup mirrors on the market. Whether you're a makeup enthusiast, a frequent traveler, or someone who appreciates eco-conscious products, I highly recommend this mirror as a must-have addition to your beauty arsenal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect little countertop mirror
reviews.reviewText: Looks great on my new white oak vanity with white quartz top. Sturdy. Easy swivel. Inexpensive but looks and works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect makeup mirror
reviews.reviewText: This little mirror is a perfect makeup mirror that is well made and looks much more expensive than the price tag. The wooden support frame is actually dovetailed which means it will be sturdy and serviceable for many years. Goldilocks size, not too big, not too small, just right ! I am well pleased with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is a nice mirror, not lighted. Easy to use. 5 stars would be lighted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed a smaller mirror for quick touch ups etc. Good mirror. Sturdy as well as light weight. It was a very good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and perfect for low profile addition to the sink.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great solution for a small bathroom. When flat, this mirror is easy to store and takes up very little space on the counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and compact
reviews.reviewText: Fits nicely in my lap while I braid my own hair. I like it! I wish there was a way to keep it from moving up and down though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The mirror is beautiful and good quality but wasn’t packaged well and arrived broken. However the customer service was great, quick option to either refund or replace.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect table mirror for seniors/anyone for shaving/make-up applicaton
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this mirror for someone in a nursing home. The wooden stand is very sturdy, stable and easy to handle. Looks like it will withstand a lot of handling in an institutional setting. Mirror is 2-sided, normal view and magnified (which is perfect for shaving or make-up application). Perhaps to large for travel - not an issue in my case.
It’s definitely NOT 10x - as I compared to another small we travel mirror that is 10x. I will estimate this one is about a 3x
Love how it's 3x closer when flipped so cool

I bought this for personal grooming. The mirror looked a little small at first, but it turns out it's just the right size and compact. There was a choice of 2 sides of the mirror - regular and magnified. The magnification was sufficient for me (I have some presbyopia). The regular was alright for grooming of my entire face as well.All-in-all, a mirror that is compact and works really well, as advertised.Only issue: Folks with a bigger face could find the mirror a little on the small side.
J'ai été agréablement surprise par la qualité du produit pour un si bon prix. Très pratique et pas encombrant.
